page.title: 05SHOPPING
page.content: In Woore and Pipe Gate there is a range of shops. There are two {grocery shops}in Woore and one in Pipe Gate. There are two{butcher's shops} in Woore. There is a{hardware shop and a{drapery shop.} The{post office at Woore also sells stationery. The shop at Pipe Gate sells{newspapers. There is also a shop in Pipe Gate for {electrical goods. Our survey showed that only 2 families did most of their shopping in Woore. 13 went to Newcastle or the Potteries, 8 to Market Drayton and 6 to Crewe or Nantwich. For{clothes or furniture}23 of the 26 families did their shopping in the Potteries, mainly in Hanley. 13 families use the{street market}at Market Drayton occasionally, but 7 families use it weekly.
